data.title: Pakistan’s biggest child pornography ring exposed by journalist. 280 minors were sexually abused and filmed over a decade, the videos were sold for 50 cents each, sometimes to pedophiles in the West over Skype

29 leading U.S. nuclear scientists praise 'unprecedented' Iran deal - "In letter to Obama, scientists - among them 5 Nobel laureates - say deal can serve as 'guidepost for future nonproliferation agreements.'"

The United States has secured commitments from a dozen countries to accept nearly half of the 52 Guantanamo prisoners already cleared for transfer, U.S. officials said on Friday, as the Obama administration tries to accelerate efforts to close the military prison
Hyperinflation looming in Venezuela: nearly 82% say they can't afford food
Five women accused of witchcraft lynched by India mob - Villagers drag middle-aged women from their huts and beat them to death around midnight in eastern Jharkhand state.
Traumatized baby elephant dies just days after witnessing his family of 5 adult elephants get murdered by poachers
New Zealand to be coal-free by 2018, 90% renewable by 2025
Bangladesh blogger killed by machete gang had asked for police protection.
Soylent 2.0 will contain algae, a next step toward fully-grown food replacements that could feed a city the size of LA using as little as 100,000 square feet of urban factory farm space
Whale Shark sawed to pieces at Chinese market whilst still alive.
